title: How has riot managed to sleep on the afk issue for nearly 7 years now?
body: I just can't understand this for the life of me on how a company can ignore such a thing for what has been around a good seven years now. I mean nothing can be said that can excuse this at all. I don't doubt that riot is hard at work when it comes to coming up with solutions for things such as this but if seven years with no sign of fixing it is not enough time then this is nothing short of incompetence.
